member.name: AppPolicyProcessTerminationMethod
member.summary: The AppPolicyProcessTerminationMethod enumeration indicates the method used to end a process.

member.name: AppPolicyProcessTerminationMethod.AppPolicyProcessTerminationMethod_ExitProcess
member.summary: Allows DLLs to execute code at shutdown. This value is expected for a desktop application, or for a Desktop Bridge application.

member.name: AppPolicyProcessTerminationMethod.AppPolicyProcessTerminationMethod_TerminateProcess
member.summary: Immediately ends the process. This value is expected for a UWP app.
